params.reason: A description for why the lock is being broken.

returns.previousHolder: The holder whose lock was broken.

returns.lockId: The generated lock ID, or bytes32(0) if already locked.

returns._0: The active lock ID, or bytes32(0) if none.

params.additionalDuration: Additional seconds to add to the expiration.

checkIn(bytes32).notice: Release a lock by checking in.

checkOut(bytes32,bytes32,uint256,string).notice: Check out an exclusive lock on a resource.

getActiveLock(bytes32).notice: Get the currently active lock for a resource.

queryLocks(bytes32).notice: Query all lock IDs for a resource (history).

renew(bytes32,uint256).notice: Extend the duration of an active lock.
